quote: Power is not what we do but what we do not - hasty and unwise actions that we repeat every day and which ultimately bring us into trouble. – Robert Greene
fact: The Michelin man is known as Mr. Bib. His name was Bibendum in the company’s first ads in 1896.
joke: Coffee has a tough time at my house, every morning it gets mugged.
